origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FintechAPI.get_core_technologies', 'description': 'This function provides an overview of core technologies in fintech based on the specified sector and focus area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of finance to focus on, e.g., banking, insurance, investments.'}, {'name': 'focus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The focus area within fintech, e.g., innovation, regulation, customer experience.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'technologies', 'description': 'A list of core technologies relevant to the specified sector and focus area.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FintechAPI.get_core_technologies, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'banking', 'focus'是'innovation'.
